content: From afar, Saturn's rings look like a solid, homogenous disk of material, but upon closer examination from Cassini, we see that there are varied structures in the rings at almost every scale imaginable.
translations: ita:Da lontano, gli anelli di Saturno sembrano un disco di materiale solido e omogeneo, ma osservandoli pi√π da vicino con la
